content.detailedDescription:
Was sitting on patio around 8:45.  my bulldog was out with me and acting really weird, running back and forth from patio door to patio door.  the i looked up and saw this bright glowing amber light traveling from west to east.  i travel a lot, have worked in aerospace industry for 16 plus years and know landing lights.  we have 2 airports, page field, a private airport in fort myers and swfl international.  i see aircraft coming and going everyday and know them, this had no sound.  it also came to a stop before turning sharply and heading southeast.  g force alone would be unbearable for a human.  also the craft wasn't in any usual flight path for either airport.  once the craft was out of sight, and that took just seconds, there was a commercial aircraft flying several thousand feet above heading into swfl international, no landing lights yet.  none of the aircraft have landing lights on at the point i saw this.  my fianc√©e also witnessed it.

we have seen other craft similar in the past and my son took a picture of one several months ago around midnight in the west.

i can't say what it was but know it wasn't an aircraft, ball lightning, weather balloon or swamp gas. (yes i'm being fastidious but this is not my first experience).

i thought it was fantastic and know it upset my dog.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright glowing dark amber light traveling west to east then almost stopiing then turning sharpely to southeast

content.detailedDescription:
So i was out for a stroll on 5/5/2016 all sea wall downtown vancouver and i just some photos that day. when i only looked at them the next day i seen an orb in the shoots. when i zoomed in on it in some of the shoots it seems to have dots which changed in number and position. im not sure if it is dust but it wasn't in one of the pictures. maybe you could check this out for me.

regards,
james
content.summary: My camera picked it up as i did not see it

content.detailedDescription: I was recording a video outside my house just for fun. the video was recorded with an ipod 5th generation. i had put my ipod down still on recording and seconds later it fell down due to the wind and it led the device to aim at the sky. after i watched the video 10 minutes later realized that when it was recording the sky it caught a really fast moving object. at first i thought it was just a bird, but then i thought how could a bird fly that fast. i took a screenshot at the screen at the exact moment the object appeared. i zoomed it and it looked very much like a ufo. i'm not sure if it is or if it's not. the video was uploaded to youtube, i slow motioned it and added the zoomed in images.
content.summary: Sunny day, ufo was fast, could barely see it on camera

content.detailedDescription: Following up on a recent sighting i reported: i just came across some news of a google earth viewer having located an ufo over the trees in the amazon with coordinates -10.268397,-64.606296 and upon close observation of the ufo in question, i've noticed a huge resemblance with the ufo i spotted on april 17th in upstate ny. although the news of the amazon sighting are recent, google earth image was recorded in 2007. see attached pic and how alike the two ufo are. shocking!!
content.summary: Resemblance with 2007 ufo spotted in amazon

content.detailedDescription: It is evening and i almost done my dinner so i think to take walk on my house,s roof and then i go to my roof and i,m walking. i love to see stars so i looked up the sky and seeing the star and then i observed there is star who starts moving so i think it was plane or a chopper so i did not concentrate on that thing but after sometime it was stop for few second and then he start moving very slowly and then he stopped and when i looking him. he make  a  bright flash and just disappear.When i see this i did not believe it was happen to me and i had never seen such a thing in my life .It just disappear in front of my eyes
content.summary: It is like star and moving straight then he stopped and make a flash and just dissapear

content.detailedDescription:
Friday 6th may 2016 was one of the hottest days of the year so far here on the south coast of england.  so at 2052 local time (1952 gmt), my wife and i were standing in our back garden enjoying the cooler evening air.  it was twilight; the sun had set but it was still 15 minutes or so until complete darkness.

we were looking at our cherry tree in our back garden, and my wife commented on how much it had blossomed in the previous few days.  i remembered that my camera was sitting on the kitchen table nearby, so i decided to take a photograph of the tree.

the camera is a kodak fz151, 16 megapixel.  although this is not a new model, it is new to me.  i had bought it a couple of weeks previously at an electronics fair, and had not really had an opportunity to test it out.  so my main reason for taking a photo was to see how well this camera would cope in low light conditions.

as soon as i took the photo of our blossoming cherry tree, i noticed on the camera's lcd screen that there was a very bright white dot to the left of the tree.  immediately i looked upwards to the corresponding position in the sky but there was nothing visible there... just as there had been nothing visible before i took the photo, either.

i took another photograph about 5 ‚Äì 10 seconds later, and then more images during the time left before it got completely dark.  i could not replicate this white light in any of them, so i assume that it could not been a reflection off something static.  the automatic flash went off in all the pictures i took, including the very first one which shows the light in the sky.

there were no aircraft visible or audible before or afterwards, and there was a layer of thin high cloud so no stars were visible through it.  there was no sign of any aeroplanes anywhere in the sky.

there was barely a breath of wind, so i would be amazed if a small reflective object had been blown in front of the camera then fallen straight to the ground.  to the best of my knowledge there were no unusual weather conditions at the time.  it was just a calm, warm, still evening.

i did wonder if it was a reflection from a low earth orbiting satellite, or an iridium flare.  the spot of white light looked very small on the lcd screen of my camera.  however i was very surprised when i looked at the photograph on my laptop's screen.  the white dot was considerably bigger than i expected.

upon zooming in, it appears that the light is shaped like a ‚Äúv‚Äù on its side.  i note that one ‚Äúleg‚Äù of the ‚Äúv‚Äù is not as bright as the other.  i was holding the camera in my hand - it was not sitting on a tripod - so it's likely that i was not holding the camera perfectly still.  so i am wondering if it is a ‚Äúflat‚Äù light and the darker ‚Äúleg‚Äù of the ‚Äúv‚Äù was caused by me moving the camera slightly.

the position of the light in the image is virtually due south from my location, which would put it above the english channel.  i cannot begin to estimate accurately the distance away or the elevation of the light (45 degrees or more probably), but clearly it was not hovering low over the neighbours' rooftops!

my wife and i did not see, hear, feel, smell, or perceive anything at all before, during, or after i took the photograph.  the only reason at all that we know that something interesting might have happened at that moment is because i took this photograph.

i do believe that ufos *could* exist, but that doesn't mean that i assume automatically that things like this light must definitely be a ufo.  i genuinely have no idea what i am looking at, in this photo.

any ideas?

edmund spicer
report written saturday 7th may 2016 (i.E. the day afterwards.)
content.summary: Light in the sky not visible to the naked eye was caught in a photograph

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i just left the st. louis cardinal game, we were driving west on hwy 40, i was the first to see it. off in the distance (approx 4 or 5 miles away) in the west (sw from our current position) i could see an extremely bright row of lights (4 round very large set of lights side by side). like stadium lighting. i pointed it out to my husband and son. my husband said "it's just lights on top of a building or crane", "no big deal"... as we got closer to it we realized, there were no buildings or cranes around! all highway and some trees. the lights were straight forward like headlights. it seemed like it was in the same spot from when i first spotted it. we got onto the off ramp from hwy 40 and were going to head south on hwy 270. as soon as we got onto hwy 270 my husband pulled to the shoulder so i could try and get some better pictures of this "floating light tower". it seemed like it was less than a quarter of a mile to the right of us at that point. 
since we were stopped and now looking up at this thing we realized it was moving really super slow instead of hanging out in mid air like we originally thought. we could now see it's triangular shape and the lights were not as i described above but rather, two in front toward the outer tip of the wings and two toward the top center. and what looked like rope lighting around the outer perimeter.The lights definitely seemed to dim down as it was passing over us.  my husband said there were a set of colored blinking lights on the under side, but i honestly didn't notice them. 
it was bigger than our truck (ext cab silverado) and made absolutely no sound?! the whole time!  that was the most amazing part... how something so big flying through the air could be so quiet? and there wasn't a moment during this amazing experience, where we felt scared or threatened in any way. it stayed a safe distance above us, about as low as a helicopter would fly when doing a traffic report.  
as it was passing over us it picked up a tremendous amount of speed. almost like it noticed us watching it... (i know, let's not get crazy)
then it took off straight toward st. louis (east) then shot up ward at an angle toward the se. within seconds it was out of sight.
even though it was about 11pm on a tuesday, there was a blues game and cardinal game that just let out... so the highways were far from empty.
surely we are not the only 3 people in stl to see this thing!! i sent a tweet to fox2now (local news) like i always do when i have something "odd" or weather related to share. and i still have not heard a response from them. which is weird. because the minute i tweeted to fox2 about a ball of fire that flew through my subdivision over my house on april 15, 2016 they were all interested in pics because they had numerous reports of the same sightings, which was later reported as a "meteor"... hmmm...  well, the pictures are not the greatest, but can clearly tell it's not a plane, nor a drone. 
before this site, i had posted to another site without pictures. someone replied with... "sounds like a stealth aircraft" he said he had a similar experience in 1995, and it was a stealth bomber. but he didn't report it.
content.summary: Large triangular aircraft, very bright white lights, hovered, completely silent, took off fast toward east then se, gone in seconds

content.detailedDescription: I could not clear the picture. the object was very visible to me and 2 other people with me. it was about 2 weeks ago. it was triangles shaped... moving vey slow and appeared to hover just above the tree line... it was being followed by a regular shaped jet, also black. they circled around the area about 3 time. not sure if it was ufo or armed forces.. just seemed very strange. as it seem to hoover i took a picture it slowly turn to the north and slowly pulled away. that is when i noticed the regular craft behind it.. i thought i took a video but must have gotten excited and forgot to hit record.. it was so low to the ground i was scared we where being invaded by another country..I don't determine ft very well.. all i know is that it was large.I posted it on facebook and another friend saw it but did not get a good picture either just red light. and another friend posted that it land in a field behind her home..
content.summary: Black triangle shape with red cockpit.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
 - i was at lunch in my car and doing a random filming of the sky - hoping to catch something.


2. what made you first notice the object?
 - objects were not noticed during the filming, only noticed after i reviewed the film a year later.  clip was taken in april 2015 and reviewed in may 2016

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
 - did not notice it - probably due to speed of object

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
 - straight-line quick flight path - no deviations
 - three ufos pass the sky within three seconds of first appearing
 - the third ufo seems to start off as two and then separates or turns and then only becomes one.  quite an interesting catch.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
 - after i reviewed the clip, i was actually pretty happy i did catch something

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
 - object was not seen initially - but only found after going frame by frame of the footage.
content.summary: Three ufos pass overhead while random filming for ufos

content.detailedDescription: Neighbor called and stated that there was something strange in the northern sky. it was a glowing reddish orange object, which to the naked eye was just a strange light. after using binoculars, we could see that it had an oval or disc shape and emitted a soft glow. certainly not a blimp, because of the way it jigged in the sky.At first, we thought it might be a helicopter, but it was totally silent, and demonstrated flight characteristics which, to us, are impossible. it would hover stationary, thin move up, down, horizontally and diagonally at incredible speeds. it was demonstrating movements as if a laser was being jigged in the sky. the sky was clear at the time and there was nothing but forest in the area. this happened on both the 5th and 6th of may at approximately 9pm.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Soft glowing object moving silently and very erratically.

content.detailedDescription:
After just getiing out of work, i had called for a ride, my grandpa was on the way to get me.I live a few minutes from work. in the sky in th
e parking lot i looked up to see a floating object, that looked to be larger than any bird ive ever seen hovering around above my jobs parking lot. the pulse of changing light is what had caught my eye: i saw a grey oval shaped object, with a light affixed to the bottom of the craft. it was a spherical type, with oval round edges to the sides. the light seemed to be centralized and vertical to the bottom of the craft, and it seemed to pulse out the different colors in the same order. over and over. red and then green then blue and then a light blue. i mentioned this to several people standing next to me, and many of the girls stared. one woman stated it was a state trooper police chopper, but me and another woman disagreed and after her comment their was staring in silence from all of us. my grandpa showed up and seeing that i had seen a u.F.O. before and noone was around, i was quick to point out the object in the sky. he got out of the car in his pajamas, to stare at the thing. i told him what the woman said, and he replied their was no way it was a state troopers chopper. i asked him after a few minutes of him standing with the car door open outside the car to get in, so we could go home. i called my grandmother. it was 10:48 pm. i told her to go outside. we chatted on the phone and he said she could see it. i told her we would bge home in a minute, to meet us out in the yard. we drove across the street, into the soup cafe parking lot. we questioned each others opinions, and stated that it could be seen from my job,walmart,and our house. we pulled into the driveway and spoke to grandma. the motion of the craft was not a linear pattern, it moved in a lazed, awkward motion, as if it didn't follow any particular flight plan. i watched it arc from the upper left to a lazy downward right slant, and it seemed to stop and hover for awhile. the craft was a dark gray object that seemed to have an aura around it, almost a light ring of energy. it reminds me of the ring the moon sometimes has around it. but it was much more faint. the color of the lights were extremely vibrant and bright. the souns was faint, far off it sounded like the hum of a small fire cracker hiss, i was amazed. papa called 911, they told him it was a state trooper pilot also. i was flustered. no way, it wasnt possible it was a state trooper. i watched the object and it seemed as if it shifted position, and i saw a orange looking light/spotlight come into view. it was odd, as the the soft orange color was in the shape of an oval, and was up over and to the left of the craft. it wasn't shining down, wasn't scanning the ground. to me that had to prove it was no state trooper. i ws in awe of the object. after standing loutside for awhile, we all vetnured inside around 11:35.Pm. i took my dog for a walk ten minutes later, the objkect was becoming distant and had veered off in the direction of walmart.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Started with hovering overtop a parking lot, seemed to progress down the street.

content.detailedDescription: Each day i point phone to sky and take random pictures cant see with naked eye or through phone only in the pics.  i have nany more at least a hundred
content.summary: everyday i point my phone to sky and i get photos i cant explain usually a plane is near by

content.detailedDescription: Picked my kids up from school around 2:30 pm, and decided to take longer route home to snap pics of odd dark clouds with several sun rays shooting through. i noticed the darker clouds shifting and moving in one area more so than the rest of the clouds. i saw darker shadows moving through the clouds, so i snapped a few pics. when i got home i examined the pics and saw the cigar/flat dark object and the odd white double lines that looked like white power lines, but they were not, they are too high. not sure about the flat white spots in the clouds, but they did not look like regular cloud formation to me. there is no doubt in my mind that these objects wanted to be seen.
content.summary: Taking pics of sun rays through dark clouds. barely saw darker movement in clouds, checked pics and saw the object.

content.detailedDescription:
This ufo come from nord heading south, some times changing speed, the light is some times strong others less bright and this ones went off in the same region of the sky,  i was at my terrace where i have a 130¬∫ vision of the sky, some times when i spot this lights i stay with tinnitus, but i believe its normal. 
i am a ufo hunter since 80s, the place where a live have this phenomenon's, since always. in this day i have observed more than 10 ufos, crossing the sky above me in different directions and speeds, most from north to south or ne, nw to se, sw, i don't know why they choose this part of the sky, but in my opinion, this is a true invasion, every time i go out to observe i know i^m going to see something, but because i have a not so good cam i am just able to record the most bright. i see 4 different kind of tech on this orbs, they also do circumnavigation, this place is at 8 miles from lisbon and half a mile from the atlantic, and i know what is a plane. i work with software to track satellites, iss and airplanes, compass and a cam. all videos uploaded are from the same night. thank you.
content.summary: Object come from nord bright like  a star heading south changing speed some times.

content.detailedDescription:
1. front porch facing thunder mountain, sedona
2. motion in the sky
3. birds
4. a grouping of 10-20 white/grey orbs/circles/ball shape objects, approx. cloud level, north by n.E. of thunder mountain.  they were grouped in a circle, maneuvering closely together left to right, above then below the clouds.
5. feelings initially was a flock of birds, then quickly realized that highly improbable to see, a flock of birds at that altitude. 
6. objects ascended above cloud line, and i lost sight of them.
content.summary: Grouping of 10-20 white/grey orbs/circles

content.detailedDescription:
I was reading a book outside on my patio, and something told me to look up. i had polarized sun glasses on and it helped me spot the object much clearer.

i witnessed another go by about 2 minutes later! in the same fashion, same shape, and same flight path. i thought it could have been a shiny helium balloon but the light emitting off it was very bright.
content.summary: Diamond shape tuning and appered to be floating

content.detailedDescription:
I leave the camera filming in infrared mode during the day and reviewed the video later, because in this mountain filmed on 25 march this year, an object of similar characteristics ( see mufon case # 75500 ), the low object too fast and lost behind this mountain

dejo la c√°mara filmando en modo infrarrojo durante el d√≠a y reviso el v√≠deo despu√©s, ya que en esta monta√±a film√© el 25 de marzo de este a√±o un objeto de similares caracter√≠sticas (ver mufon case # 75500), el objeto baja muy r√°pido y se pierde detr√°s de esta monta√±a
content.summary: Ufo very fast down behind the mountain called " cerro butulu " in la vega - cundinamarca - colombia

content.detailedDescription: Had been camping on horse farm near lexington kentucky in the early summer of 1967. three of us boys, all of thirteen years old, wandered about the horse farm most of the night. we found a small watchman's cabin, lit a wood stove, and slept on the floor. we all woke at, or just before sunrise and, decided to make our way across the farm, back to our tent. a minute or so after leaving the cabin we topped a grassy paddock hill and there it was. it stopped us in our tracks. there in the cloudless bright blue sky it sat motionless in our path. the object was immense, maybe 100 to 500 feet wide and nearly as tall. at about 9 o'clock high a perfectly smooth cut jewel. multi-sided. no windows, lights, openings, nothing. we three stood silent before it as it did the same. after a minute, or less, it dissolved before our gaping mouths and wide unblinking eyes. it made a sort of loud swish, as it disappeared. one boy then ran for home. me and the other just looked at each other. i spoke, "did you see that?" "oh yeah", was his reply.   my feeling was this was no natural phenomenon, like a cloud, but rather a visitation by "something". i know not what. that other boy that did not run will tell you the same story.
content.summary: Huge white jewel. never moved. smooth flat, multi-sided. dissolved before our eyes.

content.detailedDescription: Point your camera at the sun and you will see this.
content.summary: Ufo in front of sun

content.detailedDescription: Went out to let my dog do her thing, and this thing was very colorful and moving very quickly. then it came to a complete stop for 10 to 15 seconds, and it moved left then up then right and up then stop. all the time the lights kept changing colors. i have seen a similar object before but it was farther away and the colors were not as bright, but the movement was the same. i ran back inside to get a camera and when i returned it was gone. it was no longer then 1or 2 minutes. when i saw it before it seemed farther away, but it never left the area it was in. it looked like a twinkling star with vibrant colors,that kept changing. tonight it seem much closer and even brighter lights. i don't know what it was but i will never forget it.I showed it to my sister and brother in law when i saw it the first time, she thought the same as i did, that it was not normal but her husband thought it was a star.
content.summary: Vibrant colors changing rapidly as it would go up then over then down then left the up , it would  stop for a few seconds the go left and right very quickly then up and stop . i went back in the house to get a camera and it was gone. i

content.detailedDescription:
We sighted three huge ufos, something told me to look outside. i looked and spotted what at first appeared to be a star but it was the wrong shape appearing much brighter but too small for the moon. i couldn't make it out so i got my husband and he agreed unlike a star. we then got his camera and took many shots and we could see it was shimmering and glowed in different colours. we also spotted several small craft moving all around it in all different directions. the most i saw were 4 at once. this was at about 60 degrees above the horizon and facing west.
we then notice a different coloured one more gold coloured it was about 70 degree above the horizon and was in a southerly direction. 
the third was much like the first and more silver but it had red, blue, green colour changes. these were not the shape of any star i have ever seen from a distance with the naked eye they appeared slightly cross shaped but when zoomed in they appeared disk shaped so it was an optical illusion. 
this is current they are still there, they are way too big for any satellite and as we saw craft coming and going they do appear huge. depending on distance possible anything from 1000ft diameter to about and 8th the size of our moon. 
the small craft were quick and changed direction very quickly. they appear to be coming and going from the ufo facing west 60 degree. 
this is ongoing we have not seen any aircraft monitoring or helicopters. they maybe still there.
  
you can see different colours on some of the photos and a few have branches in the way. the red one had branches but to the naked eye it looks gold coloured. the gold photo was a single photo as i found it difficult to hold the camera still with nothing to rest on. one photo shows a what looks like a round centre with even shapes around the craft. two changed colour but the gold one remained the same. some photos show the small craft around the lat ufos. my husband and i both agreed these were ufos. our dogs were restless, we kept them inside. my husband is brave so did not worry. i was was not concerned as i feel no fear of aliens as i am an experiencer and i had a good feeling about these ufos. we watched them for quite sometimes and took photos over a couple of hours. walking outside together to try to take different shots and see if we could spot more huge ufos. we saw the three main ones and if you looked carefully you could see craft flying around and to and from the ufo facing west. this is a significant sighting by size and number.
content.summary: Three huge ufos with smaller ufo coming and going current ongoing 3hr

you can see different colours on some of the photos and a few have branches in the way. the red one had branches but to the naked eye it looks gold coloured. the gold photo was a single photo as i found it difficult to hold the camera still with nothing to rest on. one photo shows a what looks like a round centre with even shapes around the craft. two changed colour but the gold one remained the same. some photos show the small craft around the lat ufos. my husband and i both agreed these were ufos. our dogs were restless, we kept them inside. my husband is brave so did not worry. i was was not concerned as i feel no fear of aliens as i am an experiencer and i had a good feeling about these ufos. we watched them for quite sometimes and took photos over a couple of hours. walking outside together to try to take different shots and see if we could spot more huge ufos. we saw the three main ones and if you looked carefully you could see craft flying around and to and from the ufo facing west. this is a significant sighting by size and number.
content.summary: Three huge ufos with smaller ufo coming and going current ongoing 3hr

content.detailedDescription:
We sighted three huge ufos, something told me to look outside. i looked and spotted what at first appeared to be a star but it was the wrong shape appearing much brighter but too small for the moon. i couldn't make it out so i got my husband and he agreed unlike a star. we then got his camera and took many shots and we could see it was shimmering and glowed in different colours. we also spotted several small craft moving all around it in all different directions. the most i saw were 4 at once. this was at about 60 degrees above the horizon and facing west.
we then notice a different coloured one more gold coloured it was about 70 degree above the horizon and was in a southerly direction. 
the third was much like the first and more silver but it had red, blue, green colour changes. these were not the shape of any star i have ever seen from a distance with the naked eye they appeared slightly cross shaped but when zoomed in they appeared disk shaped so it was an optical illusion. 
this is current they are still there, they are way too big for any satellite and as we saw craft coming and going they do appear huge. depending on distance possible anything from 1000ft diameter to about and 8th the size of our moon. 
the small craft were quick and changed direction very quickly. they appear to be coming and going from the ufo facing west 60 degree. 
this is ongoing we have not seen any aircraft monitoring or helicopters. they maybe still there.
  
you can see different colours on some of the photos and a few have branches in the way. the red one had branches but to the naked eye it looks gold coloured. the gold photo was a single photo as i found it difficult to hold the camera still with nothing to rest on. one photo shows a what looks like a round centre with even shapes around the craft. two changed colour but the gold one remained the same. some photos show the small craft around the lat ufos. my husband and i both agreed these were ufos. our dogs were restless, we kept them inside. my husband is brave so did not worry. i was was not concerned as i feel no fear of aliens as i am an experiencer and i had a good feeling about these ufos. we watched them for quite sometimes and took photos over a couple of hours. walking outside together to try to take different shots and see if we could spot more huge ufos. we saw the three main ones and if you looked carefully you could see craft flying around and to and from the ufo facing west. this is a significant sighting by size and number.

content.detailedDescription: Series of 3 photos taken 6 seconds apart with the one in the middle having the object. the people in the photo was looking at shapes in the mountain that look like a hand peace sign. we didn't notice anything flying around that day. the picture was taken by my son. the camera used is a nikon d7200 at 1/800 sec. i am giving you the raw photos. if you post the photos, please blur out our faces.
content.summary: Discovered while viewing photos

content.detailedDescription:
I hail from the town of ridley park which is 10 miles to the south of philadelphia and about 2 miles from the philadelphia international airport.  back around the 4th of july holiday in 2012 i was having a small pool party with some friends and as the night progressed i had broken off from the main group of friends and was just catching up with 2 buddies of mine.  we will call them bill and jake.  bill is a mechanic at the airport and jake is in the army national guard.  it was roughly 1130pm est as we were talking on my back deck when a light caught my eye in the sky.  i motioned for both of them to glance up and the 3 of us stood there in complete confusion as we watched this amber light moving east to west across the sky.  the altitude would be hard to guess, but i would say it was between 10,000-20,000 feet basing it off typical air traffic living next to the airport.  the amber light moved from west to east and then hooked north directly towards the city of philadelphia as we lost sight of it over the trees.  we immediately muttered some choice words to the effect of what the heck was that as there was no sound and even with planes at typical cruising altitude around here we can still hear them.  as we continued to discuss what we just saw another light appeared from the same direction almost identical altitude (from the best we could tell) and it made the same turn towards the city.  the light itself was solid in color.  no flickering, no blinking or flashing, and no dimming. the amber light held strong in intensity the entire time and the second one did as well which is odd considering given its flight path we would have seen it from the front, the bottom, and then the back. now some back story.  i myself am a house painter by day and an amateur astronomer by night.  i have seen satellites, meteors, the whole nine yards and nothing could compare to what i had just witnessed.  also, this was the first year i was not doing my annual fireworks display up in the mountains so i have seen my share of pyrotechnics and aerial flares.  so to me it was not a plane (as i see them daily at all altitudes and flight patterns which this one did not follow), not anything astronomical by any means, not a helicopter (altitude appeared to be too high and the light did not fit any helicopter i have ever seen military or civilian), and not a chinese lantern as i have witnessed these set off as well.  bill immediately concluded that it was nothing he had ever seen before at the airport or anything that made sense in terms of a civilian or commercial aircraft and jake chimed in with it not being anything military that he had ever seen.  so we sat there stumped and staring at the sky hoping for one more pass by another object, but there was nothing.  i feel the need to mention as well considering i said i was having a party. my only vice is smoking cigarettes (i do not drink or use any other mind altering substances). 
a few days later i was catching up with my cousin who had told me previously while in a golf outing in the mountains about a ufo sighting he had before.   so i figured i would share my story with him.  he was relieved he wasn‚Äôt the only person he knew to had seen something he could not explain.  i described the object in detail just as i have above and he compared his story to mine and the differences between what we saw.  we talked about the only wildcard which we both admittedly knew nothing about being a drone or some type of uav.  if i remember correctly this is around the time when the government started using them stateside a lot more frequently, but still if the idea is for them not to be seen then why have a light on it that is so bright.  fast track to about september 2012 i get a call from my cousin who was in touch with me over the weekend as he was up looking for some dark skies for a photography session in the mountains trying to shoot the milky way (photography is his hobby and he is quite good at it). he was on his way home coming down 76 east (pa turnpike) somewhere between elizabeth town, pa and morgantown, pa when a light caught his eye.  he reached for his nikon dslr and began filming while he was driving.  the light he was filming was moving with him and it fit the same description as i had mentioned above.  at one point while driving the light moved so abruptly it caused him to jerk the camera completely to the side window to keep it in the shot.  he then pulled over to the side of the highway deciding it was better and safer to film from the side of the road than continue to do so while driving.  once he pulled over his memory card was full sadly and he was not able to continue to film the object anymore.  which he regrets because the object was then joined by 3 more lights of the same description and they continued moving in the same direction in what he described as a staggered column until they were out of view.  obviously what is not filmed can be taken with a grain of salt by any investigator or person looking into a video, but to me he has no reason to lie.
content.summary: Amber light (non chinese lantern observed before) flew overhead then turned followed by second light following same exactly flight path.

content.detailedDescription: I was just sitting in my room and my roommate observed something weird in sky and we both checked it it was a v shaped object and it remain stable shape for upto 3-4 minutes and it was going down and we lost its appearance because it was gone down
content.summary: I saw a v shaped ufo but far from me

content.detailedDescription:
10:30 pm talking on phone with friend sitting at upstairs bedroom window. a 10 foot diameter black saucer with heat signature around it, flew over the house at about 20 feet above me and hovered across the street on the river levee. it hovered next to a large tree and then tipped up on its side moved parallel to the tree and then moved in front of the tree and a watery ball enveloped it and the black saucer separated into 3 parts, like 3 discs stacked up in the watery ball settled on the levee as it landed and disappeared. i was speaking to my freind on the phone and was describing what i was seeing the whole time.

i told her i was going down stairs to look out the front door, and i saw a white suv across the street, so i went back upstairs to master bathroom, hung up the phone and brushed my teeth getting ready for bed and the sink vanity started moving up and down and side to side and i had to hold on to the vanity. i thought i was going to fall down or pass out.

after that i went into the master bedroom and got my dog clara so we could go downstairs for her potty time and as i approached the top of the stairs, they started separating from the wall and a intense white light was seen coming up from under the stairs and coming through it as it unzipped about 6 feet down from the top of the stairs from the wall. the opening was about 18 to 24 inches wide and both me and clara went down the stairs anyway and the stair sealed back up.

we came back upstairs and got in bed and fell asleep. at about 2:20am, heard a sound of a diesel truck air brakes release, looked at my video door bell monitor for the downstairs front door and saw  bright white cloud, so i took several still photos of it. in the morning i turned the brightness contrast down and then seen these pictures of aliens, a panda bear, a insect, and other beings, one image lost was a cacassian long haired man that looked like fabian in a spandex suit and cape.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black saucer flew over house and landed across the street. i took pictures of them with video door bell camera
